metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2040 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in ownCloud before4.0.15, 4.5.x before 4.5.11, and 5.0.x before 5.0.6 allow remoteauthenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecifiedvectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2040` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
